data.title: Computer Aided Systems Theory – EUROCAST 2022: 18th International Conference, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain, February 20–25, 2022, Revised Selected Papers 3031253116, 9783031253119
data.meta_description: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 18th International Conference on Computer-Aided Systems Theory,  E...
